an4.91:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo asuro hoti asuraparivaro?
an4.91:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussilo hoti papadhammo, parisapissa hoti dussila papadhamma.
an4.91:2.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo asuro hoti asuraparivaro.
an4.91:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo asuro hoti devaparivaro?
an4.91:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussilo hoti papadhammo, parisa ca khvassa hoti silavati kalyanadhamma.
an4.91:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo asuro hoti devaparivaro.
an4.91:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo devo hoti asuraparivaro?
an4.91:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo silava hoti kalyanadhammo, parisa ca khvassa hoti dussila papadhamma.
an4.91:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo devo hoti asuraparivaro.
an4.91:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo devo hoti devaparivaro?
an4.91:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo silava hoti kalyanadhammo, parisapissa hoti silavati kalyanadhamma.
an4.91:5.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo devo hoti, devaparivaro.
an4.91:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
